dataObject.content: Things look less promising in the U.S. Last week, the Environmental Protection Agency confirmed that the Trump administration had relaxed enforcement of regulations to help polluting industries deal with the pandemic.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"It is biased because it negatively cites actions by the Trump administration from the author's point of view, the text has no name source, it only cites that an agency confirmed it, but does not indicate further details of this confirmation."}
